statements: SELECT * FROM player_progress LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_percentage FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT player_id, total_playtime, last_played_at FROM player_progress WHERE game_id = 'abc123' AND achievement_unlocked = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, MAX(progress_percentage) AS highest_progress FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, game_id, total_playtime, last_played_at FROM player_progress ORDER BY last_played_at DESC, progress_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE game_id = 'fb2c7733-7e4e-4ec6-bf48-6b4f1f8d3d88';
SELECT player_id, progress_percentage, total_playtime FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY last_played_at DESC;
SELECT player_id, progress_percentage, total_playtime, last_played_at FROM player_progress WHERE achievement_unlocked = TRUE ORDER BY last_played_at ASC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_players > 10 ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level FROM player_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, experience FROM player_progress WHERE game_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, completion_date FROM player_achievements WHERE unlocked = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level, last_played FROM player_progress ORDER BY last_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = '12345' AND game_id = '67890'
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE experience > 1000 ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, unlocked, completion_date FROM player_achievements WHERE unlocked = TRUE ORDER BY completion_date ASC
SELECT player_id, game_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM player_achievements GROUP BY player_id, game_id HAVING COUNT(achievement_id) > 5
SELECT DISTINCT game_id FROM player_progress WHERE level >= 10
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress;
SELECT player_id, level FROM PlayerProgress WHERE game_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(experience) FROM PlayerProgress;
SELECT player_id, game_id, MAX(level) FROM PlayerProgress GROUP BY player_id, game_id;
SELECT game_id, description FROM GameSettings WHERE initial_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProgress;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM PlayerProgress WHERE game_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, game_id, MAX(level) AS max_level FROM PlayerProgress GROUP BY player_id, game_id;
SELECT achievement_name, date_achieved FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT game_id, description FROM GameSettings WHERE initial_level < max_level ORDER BY game_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress FROM player_progress ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game_info WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2
SELECT player_id, reward_name FROM player_rewards ORDER BY claim_date
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, progress, last_played_date FROM player_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, genre FROM player_progress INNER JOIN game_info ON player_progress.game_id = game_info.game_id WHERE last_played_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 10 AND achievement_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, reward_name, claim_date FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = 20;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_information;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email FROM player_information ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT achievement_id, player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, game_name, game_genre FROM game_catalog WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, SUM(game_score) AS total_score FROM game_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_information WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_information JOIN player_achievements ON player_information.player_id = player_achievements.player_id;

SELECT player_name, game_name, game_score FROM player_information JOIN game_progress ON player_information.player_id = game_progress.player_id JOIN game_catalog ON game_progress.game_id = game_catalog.game_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_information JOIN player_inventory ON player_information.player_id = player_inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_name, player_email, game_name, game_genre FROM player_information JOIN game_progress ON player_information.player_id = game_progress.player_id JOIN game_catalog ON game_progress.game_id = game_catalog.game_id WHERE game_genre = 'RPG';
